title: Let's Talk About Bluey - Gregway 04.10.24
description:
Support us with a Kinda Funny Membership here on YouTube or on http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny 

Why is this show so popular with kids and parents? Let's talk about it -- and eventually talk about the big cliffhanger that just happened.
